dict.string: TasksApp needs access to your calendar to sync tasks with calendar events and provide intelligent scheduling suggestions.
TasksApp needs access to your reminders to import existing reminders and keep them in sync with your tasks.
TasksApp needs continuous location access to deliver location-based task reminders even when the app is in the background.
TasksApp needs your location to provide location-based task reminders and suggest nearby tasks.
TasksApp needs microphone access to enable voice input for creating and managing tasks hands-free.
TasksApp uses speech recognition to convert your voice commands into tasks and actions.
TasksApp reads your health data to intelligently schedule wellness-related tasks based on your activity patterns.
TasksApp writes to Health to log completed wellness tasks and track your health-related achievements.
TasksApp integrates with HomeKit to trigger home automation scenes when tasks are completed or at scheduled times.
TasksApp uses Siri to let you create, manage, and complete tasks using voice commands.
